###
### Sisterly Love: More Money
###
### I always felt that the malfunctioning-slot-machine money drop in
### the DLC2 mission Sisterly Love was pretty anemic and unimpressive.
### This mod buffs it up slightly, though it turns out there's not a
### *lot* that we can really do with it.
###
### Generated by gen_sisterly_love_more_money.py
###

# Use "biggest" money drop
SparkLevelPatchEntry,(1,1,0,Strip_P),/Dandelion/Missions/Side/BrotherlyLove/ItemPool_Money_BrotherlyLove.ItemPool_Money_BrotherlyLove,BalancedItems.BalancedItems[0],0,,(InventoryBalanceData=/Game/Pickups/Money/DA_InventoryBalance_Currency_MoneyTripleStack,ResolvedInventoryBalanceData=InventoryBalanceData'"/Game/Pickups/Money/DA_InventoryBalance_Currency_MoneyTripleStack.DA_InventoryBalance_Currency_MoneyTripleStack"',Weight=(BaseValueConstant=1))

# Increase initial money drop count
SparkLevelPatchEntry,(1,1,0,Strip_P),/Dandelion/Missions/Side/BrotherlyLove/ItemPool_Money_BrotherlyLove.ItemPool_Money_BrotherlyLove,Quantity.BaseValueConstant,0,,100
